riding.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the sport or activity of riding horses
riding.translation[0].definitions[0].not: riding school/stables (=place where people learn to ride horses)
riding.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Shall we go riding on Saturday?
riding.translation[1].definitions[0].def: one of the three official parts into which Yorkshire, northern England, was formerly divided. The three divisions were called the East Riding, West Riding, and North Riding.
